titleStmt.title: The humble addresse of the provinciall synod, of Fife in Scotland. To His most sacred Majesty, after the receipt of his most gracious letter, to the several presbyteries of the Church of Scotland. Directed to the Right Honourable the Earle of Lauderdale, gentleman of His Majesties bed-chamber, and Lord Secretarie of Scotland, to me by him presented to His most Excellent Majesty.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. Synod of Fife.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for George Calvert at the Half-Moon in Pauls. Church-yard, between the two North-doors,

notesStmt.note: First leaf contains royal arms on verso.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Half-Moon in Pauls. Church-yard, between the two North-doors
